comments.comment: Seems like issue in hadoop Shell class. You running in a cygwin context? I'd say close this issue and raise the problem on the list.
I think you should use the hadoop version from branch-1-win hadoop branch if you are not using cygwin. (see HADOOP-8223)
Closing this. HBase unit tests with hadoop build for windows (branch-1-win or hadoop-2.3) works.
